programs.name: Barber Apprenticeship
programs.summary: Earn while you learn. Master the art of barbering with hands-on training and mentorship from industry professionals.

programs.name: HVAC & Welding
programs.summary: High-demand skilled trades training. Get certified and start a rewarding career in heating, ventilation, air conditioning, or welding.

programs.name: Healthcare (CNA/QMA)
programs.summary: Fast-track to healthcare careers. Become a Certified Nursing Assistant or Qualified Medication Aide in weeks, not years.

programs.name: Drug Testing Business
programs.summary: Start your own business. Learn to operate a mobile drug testing service with full training and certification.

programs.name: Digital Skills
programs.summary: Master essential tech skills. From basic computer literacy to advanced digital tools for the modern workplace.

programs.name: Leadership Development
programs.summary: Build leadership capabilities. Develop the soft skills and management expertise employers value most.

features.title: Job Placement
features.description: We don't just train you‚Äîwe help you get hired. Our job placement program connects graduates with employers.

features.title: Industry Certifications
features.description: Earn recognized credentials that open doors. All programs lead to industry-standard certifications.

features.title: Financial Support
features.description: Don't let cost hold you back. Scholarships, grants, and flexible payment options available.

features.title: Mentorship
features.description: Learn from the best. Every student gets paired with an experienced mentor in their field.

features.title: Flexible Scheduling
features.description: Life doesn't stop for training. Choose from day, evening, and weekend classes that fit your schedule.

features.title: Fast Track
features.description: Get to work faster. Most programs can be completed in 8-16 weeks with intensive training.

testimonials.quote: The barber apprenticeship changed my life. I went from unemployed to running my own shop in less than a year.
testimonials.author: Marcus J., Barber Shop Owner

testimonials.quote: The HVAC program gave me skills that are in demand everywhere. I had three job offers before I even graduated.
testimonials.author: Sarah M., HVAC Technician

testimonials.quote: As a single mom, I needed something fast and affordable. The CNA program was perfect‚Äînow I have a stable career in healthcare.
testimonials.author: Jennifer L., Certified Nursing Assistant

testimonials.quote: Starting my own drug testing business seemed impossible until I found this program. Now I'm my own boss.
testimonials.author: David R., Business Owner
